Minutes - September 29, 1954
PagÂ© 11
EXECUTIVE SESSION
During the executive session the question of possible additions
to the constituent membership was discussed.
The full group met for luncheon at the Gallery Room of the
Dupont Plaza Hotel. William Woods, Manager of WQED described the
operation of the Pittsburgh ETV station.
The group adjourned at 2:30 P.M.
Signed
*aiph "S tee fie
Executive Director
